explains: v. 使处于不利地位，不公正地对待；处罚，惩罚，处以刑罚；（体育运动中）判罚

sentences.en: The professor will penalize lightly for late assignments.
sentences.cn: 如果迟交作业，教授会从轻处罚。

sentences.en: Mr. Gill said the city could penalize the company if it did not complete the work on schedule.
sentences.cn: 吉尔先生说，如果该公司没有按时完成工作，市政府将对其进行处罚。

sentences.en: The new law appears to penalize the poorest members of society.
sentences.cn: 新法规似乎不利于社会中的最贫困者。
